description:
After the Lido raid, Gimual Iskui becomes the commander of http://anidb.net/ch89503 [Killy]`s subsequent operation in Uoodo. As the Chief of Police, Iskui uses his position to funnel priceless jijirium to the pockets of the http://anidb.net/ch90342 [Secret Society]. Unprepared for the fact that http://anidb.net/ch15676 [Chirico] survived the attempt on his life at Lido, Iskui`s nerves begin to break as the eyes of the Melkian army follow Chirico into his midst.
Source: MAL
name: Gimual Iskui
